name: Real Self - True Self
description:
People always put up a facade, never revealing their true intentions.

Explore the world with a new point of viewpoint and see how ugly humans can get.

No real end goal,  just walk around and observe. Use you mouse to discover something new.

Programming and Design: Me

Sprites: Me

BG Music: Tales of Vesperia OST - Vows of Unity

City Backgrounds: Free Pixel Art Street Backgrounds on Craftpix.net

Everything else: Google Images
